verses.name: 1 Samuel 18:13
verses.text: Therefore Saul removed him from him, and made him his captain over a thousand; and he went out and came in before the people.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 18:14
verses.text: And David behaved himself wisely in all his ways; and the Lord was with him.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 18:15
verses.text: Wherefore when Saul saw that he behaved himself very wisely, he was afraid of him.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 18:16
verses.text: But all Israel and Judah loved David, because he went out and came in before them.
